Description: North End 3 bedroom 2 bathroom. Very close to North Station and TD Garden. Available for move in on 9/1/2023. Hardwood flooring through out the apartment. Beautiful exposed brick in the living room. Big windows for plenty of natural lighting. Virtual tour is available. Laundry in the building. 1 months broker fee. Call now!
